pages.text: Cancrinos is a small Jurassic crustacean known from the Solnhofen Limestone of Germany. It is a crustacean related to slipper lobsters and is characterized by its bunny ear like antennae that slipper lobsters lack. There used to be a Cretaceous species, but it has since been reassigned to its own genus.
